mapper.select: select a.deliver_receipt_id, create_time, release_time, deliver_intention_id, receive_emp_ids, a.comment, operate_emp_id, enable_edit, count(b.deliver_receipt_id is not null or null) as "sum", count(b.status != 2 or null) as "not_receive_sum", case when count(b.deliver_receipt_id is not null or null) = count(b.status != 2 or null) or enable_edit = 0 then 0 else 1 end as is_delete from t_deliver_receipt as a left join t_deliver_machine as b on a.deliver_receipt_id = b.deliver_receipt_id where operate_emp_id = #{deliverReceipt.operateEmpId} group by a.deliver_receipt_id

select a.deliver_receipt_id, create_time, release_time, deliver_intention_id, receive_emp_ids, a.comment, operate_emp_id, enable_edit, count(b.deliver_receipt_id is not null or null) as "sum", count(b.status != 2 or null) as "not_receive_sum" from t_deliver_receipt as a left join t_deliver_machine as b on a.deliver_receipt_id = b.deliver_receipt_id where enable_edit = 1 and (receive_emp_ids LIKE concat(#{empId}, ',%') OR receive_emp_ids LIKE concat('%,', #{empId}) OR receive_emp_ids LIKE concat(concat('%,', #{empId}), ',%') OR receive_emp_ids = #{empId}) group by a.deliver_receipt_id
